title: Slightly condensed geometric sans (grotesk)
content:
Hello,  
The ending of the r shoulder is very slanted, and the dots on i and j are pretty nice.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819234042im_/http:/typophile.com/files/image-3_4342.jpg)

Can anyone here identify this typeface ?
author: laurent

comments.content:
I'm not sure it's a 100% match, but it's si close it did the trick !  
And it was fast ! One million thanks Renko.

Cheers  
L.
